bibl.title: Territory of Washington v. Sterling P. White. Subpoena
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

div1.p:
Territory of Washington, County of Spokane }SS Territory of Washington, Plaintiff -vs.- Sterling Stephen P. White Defendant } In the District Court of the Territory of Washington and for the Lincoln Judicial District thereof, holding terms at Cheney, Spokane County, in said Territory.
To the Sheriff of Lincoln SpokaneCounty, Greeting: IN THE NAME OF THE UNITED STATES, You are hereby commanded to summon Allen Stookey Franklin Samuel Gentry Perry Harold Alfred Stoaky to be and appear before the District Court aforesaid at the Court House, in Cheney, in said County, on the forthwith day of April A.D. 1885, at - o'clock, - M., to there give evi- dence in the above entitled cause on the part of said Plaintiff Defendant. Witness the Hon. George Turner Associate Justice of the Supreme Court of Washington Territory, and Judge of said Court, and the deal there- of affixed, this 28 day of April A.D. 1885 Kate W. Fraurbach Clerk By R.S. Brobach Deputy

TERRITORY OF WASHINGTON, County of Spokane } SS.
I hereby certify that I served the within Subpoena on the within named witness, R. Harold, Clerk by reading the same ot him in said County, on this 24th day of April A.D> 1885 John Cody Sheriff. By J.N. Friedlander Deputy

Allen Stoakey, S Gentry (guess) P Harold Case No. 1537 Subpoena In the District Court of the Territory of Washington, and for the First Judicial District thereof, holding Terms at Cheney, Spokane County, in said Territory. Territory, Plaintiff vs. Stephen Sterling P. White, Defendant Returned and Filed this 29 day of April A.D. 188 Kate W. Fraubach Clerk. By R.S. Brobach Deputy Sheriff's Fees. Serving 2 names at 40 80 Mileage 176 miles at 10 1760 Total, ---$1840
